/home/haiyan/Research/CentralizedAgentFr.content_with_line_numbers:
1â†’module adder_16bit #(
   2â†’    parameter WIDTH = 16
   3â†’) (
   4â†’    input clk,
   5â†’    input rst,
   6â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] a,
   7â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] b,
   8â†’    input cin,
   9â†’    output reg [WIDTH-1:0] sum,
  10â†’    output reg cout,
  11â†’    output reg overflow
  12â†’);
  13â†’
  14â†’// Internal signals for carry propagation
  15â†’reg [WIDTH-1:0] carry;
  16â†’
  17â†’// Combinational logic for ripple-carry adder
  18â†’always @(*) begin
  19â†’    // Initialize carry chain
  20â†’    carry[0] = cin;
  21â†’    
  22â†’    // Ripple-carry adder logic
  23â†’    for (int i = 0; i < WIDTH; i++) begin
  24â†’        {carry[i+1], sum[i]} = a[i] + b[i] + carry[i];
  25â†’    end
  26â†’    
  27â†’    // Output carry
  28â†’    cout = carry[WIDTH];
  29â†’    
  30â†’    // Overflow detection for signed arithmetic:
  31â†’    // Overflow occurs when two positive numbers produce a negative result,
  32â†’    // or two negative numbers produce a positive result.
  33â†’    // This is detected by comparing the sign bits of inputs and output.
  34â†’    overflow = (a[WIDTH-1] == b[WIDTH-1]) && (a[WIDTH-1] != sum[WIDTH-1]);
  35â†’end
  36â†’
  37â†’endmodule

/home/haiyan/Research/CentralizedAgentFr.content_with_line_numbers:
1â†’module adder_16bit #(
   2â†’    parameter WIDTH = 16
   3â†’) (
   4â†’    input clk,
   5â†’    input rst,
   6â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] a,
   7â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] b,
   8â†’    input cin,
   9â†’    output reg [WIDTH-1:0] sum,
  10â†’    output reg cout,
  11â†’    output reg overflow
  12â†’);
  13â†’
  14â†’// Internal signals for ripple carry logic
  15â†’wire [WIDTH-1:0] carry;
  16â†’
  17â†’// Generate carry chain using full adders
  18â†’genvar i;
  19â†’generate
  20â†’    // First full adder (LSB)
  21â†’    full_adder fa0 (
  22â†’        .a(a[0]),
  23â†’        .b(b[0]),
  24â†’        .cin(cin),
  25â†’        .sum(sum[0]),
  26â†’        .cout(carry[0])
  27â†’    );
  28â†’
  29â†’    // Remaining full adders
  30â†’    for (i = 1; i < WIDTH; i = i + 1) begin : fa_chain
  31â†’        full_adder fa (
  32â†’            .a(a[i]),
  33â†’            .b(b[i]),
  34â†’            .cin(carry[i-1]),
  35â†’            .sum(sum[i]),
  36â†’            .cout(carry[i])
  37â†’        );
  38â†’    end
  39â†’endgenerate
  40â†’
  41â†’// Output carry and overflow
  42â†’assign cout = carry[WIDTH-1];
  43â†’
  44â†’// Overflow detection for signed addition: when sign of result differs from expected
  45â†’// Expected sign is determined by sign bits of operands and carry into MSB
  46â†’always @(*) begin
  47â†’    if (rst) begin
  48â†’        overflow = 1'b0;
  49â†’    end else begin
  50â†’        overflow = (a[WIDTH-1] == b[WIDTH-1]) && (a[WIDTH-1] != sum[WIDTH-1]);
  51â†’    end
  52â†’end
  53â†’
  54â†’// Full adder primitive
  55â†’primitive full_adder (
  56â†’    input a, b, cin,
  57â†’    output sum, cout
  58â†’);
  59â†’    table
  60â†’        // a b cin : sum cout
  61â†’        0 0 0 : 0 0;
  62â†’        0 0 1 : 1 0;
  63â†’        0 1 0 : 1 0;
  64â†’        0 1 1 : 0 1;
  65â†’        1 0 0 : 1 0;
  66â†’        1 0 1 : 0 1;
  67â†’        1 1 0 : 0 1;
  68â†’        1 1 1 : 1 1;
  69â†’    endtable
  70â†’endprimitive
  71â†’
  72â†’endmodule

/home/haiyan/Research/CentralizedAgentFr.content_with_line_numbers:
1â†’module adder_16bit #(
   2â†’    parameter WIDTH = 16
   3â†’) (
   4â†’    input clk,
   5â†’    input rst,
   6â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] a,
   7â†’    input [WIDTH-1:0] b,
   8â†’    input cin,
   9â†’    output reg [WIDTH-1:0] sum,
  10â†’    output reg cout,
  11â†’    output reg overflow
  12â†’);
  13â†’
  14â†’// Internal signals for ripple carry chain
  15â†’reg [WIDTH-1:0] internal_sum;
  16â†’reg [WIDTH-1:0] carry;
  17â†’
  18â†’// Initialize carry to input carry
  19â†’always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
  20â†’    if (rst) begin
  21â†’        sum <= 16'd0;
  22â†’        cout <= 1'b0;
  23â†’        overflow <= 1'b0;
  24â†’        carry <= 1'b0;
  25â†’    end else begin
  26â†’        // Ripple carry adder implementation
  27â†’        carry[0] <= cin;
  28â†’        for (int i = 0; i < WIDTH; i = i + 1) begin
  29â†’            internal_sum[i] <= a[i] ^ b[i] ^ carry[i];
  30â†’            carry[i+1] <= (a[i] & b[i]) | (a[i] & carry[i]) | (b[i] & carry[i]);
  31â†’        end
  32â†’
  33â†’        // Assign outputs
  34â†’        sum <= internal_sum;
  35â†’        cout <= carry[WIDTH];
  36â†’        
  37â†’        // Overflow detection for signed addition:
  38â†’        // Overflow occurs when two positive numbers produce a negative result,
  39â†’        // or two negative numbers produce a positive result.
  40â†’        // This is detected by comparing the sign bits of inputs and output.
  41â†’        // If sign(a) == sign(b) but sign(sum) != sign(a), overflow occurred.
  42â†’        overflow <= (a[WIDTH-1] == b[WIDTH-1]) && (a[WIDTH-1] != sum[WIDTH-1]);
  43â†’    end
  44â†’end
  45â†’
  46â†’endmodule
